definition: at all times and in all places (idiom)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: The success, is in each individual heart the loftiest dream.
sentences.chinese: 古今中外，無人不在時時刻刻做着成功的夢想。

sentences.english: This bourn is the one that many serious authors go in for.
sentences.chinese: 這是古今中外許多嚴肅的藝術家孜孜以求的藝術境界。

sentences.english: All times, how many people in order to serve the motherland has been heavy resistance difficult?
sentences.chinese: 古今中外，有多少人爲了報效祖國而受到了重重阻難？

sentences.english: Stop and think before making the decisions, well, seems to work in all countries the history.
sentences.chinese: 先靜下來，好好思考，再做決定，看來古今中外皆然。

sentences.english: Man. At the most, man and woman are equal, coz except for Matriarchy;
sentences.chinese: 至多就是平等，古今中外女人沒佔過主導地位。

sentences.english: He read all kinds of books , ancient and modern, Chinese and foreign.
sentences.chinese: 他看了各式各樣的書，古今中外都有。

sentences.english: All times and in all, many great people are relying on self-taught.
sentences.chinese: 古今中外，許多偉人都是靠自學成才的。

sentences.english: Enthusiasm is that long-sought-after fountain of eternal life.
sentences.chinese: 熱忱是古今中外人們所追求的長生不老之泉。

sentences.english: His paintings are ancient and modern techniques to melt in a furnace and have a unique style.
sentences.chinese: 他的畫能融古今中外技法於一爐而又有其獨特風格。

sentences.english: The active teaching thought is well-established, crosses all times and in all countries the history.
sentences.chinese: 活動教學的思想源遠流長，橫貫古今中外的歷史。

sentences.english: He read all kinds of books , ancient and modem, Chinese and foreign.
sentences.chinese: 他閱讀過各種各樣的書，古今中外都有。

sentences.english: Corruption and politics go hand in hand in human history without exception.
sentences.chinese: 腐敗作爲政治的伴生物，古今中外莫能例外。

definition: lit. enough books to make a pack-ox sweat or to fill a house to the rafters (idiom); fig. many books
for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
conversant with things past and present/erudite and informed
the Hundred Schools of Thought, the various schools of thought and their exponents during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States Periods (770-220 BC)
lit. to quote the classics/to quote chapter and verse (idiom)
